# Testing Documentation

## Overview
Testing in Gaia Code uses a unified test system managed through divine intervention.

## Test Location
All tests are consolidated in `tests.json` with input/output format.

## Running Tests
```bash
# Run divine intervention tests
node test_divine_intervention.js

# Run simple tests  
node test_simple.js

# Run git evolution tests
node test_git_evolution.js
```
